channel.title: Summer on Curt Poff
channel.description: Recent content in Summer on Curt Poff

item.title: Sayonara summer
item.description: Man, did we ever have a gorgeous summer. Last year was waaaay too hot. But this year was fantastic. Warm, sunny, lovely sunsets, the works.

item.title: Still on the lookout
item.description: Summer is drawing to a close here in Portland, and I’m still looking for work. I had a good month of job search once my code class was done. But no solid offers came from it. So I’ll continue the search.
